channel.title: Help with making shops
channel.description: hey well im using the svew-scape v1.5 source for my server running moprscape client and whenever i use shopmaker v1.0 by jaywalker i put it in right and everything (i think :|) but when i run it i get this error [code]- Svew Scape v1 - .. Online!:D Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "3 0 Super_1337_shop" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:121) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:31) at server.main(server.java:29) [/code] and when i log in it just stays black for a couple seconds then disconnects and ses im alredy logged in when i try to log back in? I need help for this guys, please. also in the shop i used some items like godsword 3rd age and d claws. all the new awesome items P.S. if any1 has a surce with d claws and godsworda dn boid n stuff please post a link for it here. thanks in advance, Hawk.

item.title: Help with making shops
item.dc:creator: @skate0ordie1234 skate0ordie1234
item.description:
@skate0ordie1234 wrote:

double check and make sure you dont have too many items in the shop then it can hold.

Read full topic

You actually can Copy/Paste!

item.title: Help with making shops
item.dc:creator: @3rik247 3rik247
item.description:
@3rik247 wrote:

I made the Svew-Scape v1 and v1.5 -

I never get any errors, but maybe your code is wrong, or your client is not to be used for my source Hope i helped, i use the pkthemhoes client (pkthemhoes.tk)

item.title: Help with making shops
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

Tabs, Tabs, Tabs. Don’t use shopmakers.

Make sure you put tabs inside your shops.cfg to seperate your items.

Tabs FTFW!!

Oh and I think you can’t C&P into a .cfg

Tabs.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with making shops
item.dc:creator: @hawkfrost57 hawkfrost57
item.description:
@hawkfrost57 wrote:

hey well im using the svew-scape v1.5 source for my server running moprscape client and whenever i use shopmaker v1.0 by jaywalker
i put it in right and everything (i think :|) but when i run it i get this error

- Svew Scape v1 - .. Online!:D Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "3 0 Super_1337_shop" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:121) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:31) at server.main(server.java:29)
and when i log in it just stays black for a couple seconds then disconnects and ses im alredy logged in when i try to log back in?
I need help for this guys, please. also in the shop i used some items like godsword 3rd age and d claws. all the new awesome items
P.S. if any1 has a surce with d claws and godsworda dn boid n stuff please post a link for it here.
thanks in advance,
Hawk.

Read full topic
